amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 116-330 to add research on harmful algal bloom development to U.S. Geological Survey research conducted under the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 116-330 to add research on harmful algal bloom development to U.S. Geological Survey research conducted under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Katko amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Katko.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Katko amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
